page.title: 01Upton Magna_Uffington Block
page.content: Our grid of 12 squares consists of two villages Uffington and Upton Magna. Haughmound Hill is a large piece of land_cover. The main land_cover is farmland crops, other than grass. Haughmound Hill is very attractive. Many people come to the hill ,for picnics and walks.There are entrances from Upton Magna, Uffington and varied places.There are public houses called the Corbet Arms, one in Uffington and one in Upton Magna.They are named the same because of the landed family the Corbets.The smithy in Upton Magna has recently been reopened after 14 years. There is a mini estate called Frank Cross Drive and recenty a new estate has been built.There is a church in Uffington and one in Upton Magna.The church in Upton Magna is called St.Lucia's and Uffington's church is called Holy Trinity.
